owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.payLoad: message received from L1 that needs to be executed.*

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateL2MessageExecutor(address).details: Update the address of the L2MessageExecutor contract.

params._l2MessageExecutor: the address of L2 contract used to relay L1 messages.*

RetryableTicketCreated(uint256).notice: Emitted when a retryable ticket is created for relaying L1 message to L2.

inbox().notice: Address of arbitrum's L1 inbox contract.

l2MessageExecutor().notice: Address of the L2MessageExecutor contract on arbitrum.

relayMessage(bytes,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: sends message received from timeLock to L2MessageExecutor.

timeLock().notice: Address of the governance TimeLock contract.
